sequence:
Gentle and Sweet Ooshio!

<size=45>Ooshio the Secretary</size>

scripts.say: It was an ordinary morning. The cool sea breeze was blowing, the sun was gently rising, and the port was wrapped in silence.
In the distance one could see the silhouette of a young girl walking with a cheerful gait, heading towards the Commander's office.
I opened the door to my office and—
This place was a mess when I went home yesterday, but someone had thoroughly cleaned it up. It almost looked like a newly built apartment ready for an occupant.
Even the air smelled fresher than it usually did because all the furniture had been polished to a mirror sheen.
And in the center of the room was a young girl, silently standing around.
Mornin', Commander~ My name's Ooshio, I'm here to serve as yer secretary~
As she greeted me, she left her broom on a shelf nearby.
*Giggle*, I know ya never asked me to clean the office, but I'm glad ya like its new look~
Now just sit down 'n relax, Commander~
I sat down in my chair as Ooshio served me coffee and some biscuits.
Ya oughta keep yer sugar intake low in order to stay healthy~
Whatcha want for breakfast? Bacon 'n eggs? Ya sure ya oughta have both?
It seemed like Ooshio was going to spoil me rotten before I could even start working.
I reckon we'll be spendin' a lotta time together from now on♪ Hope I can be of use to ya~
